<script type="text/ng-template" id="user-log-out-template"><div role="dialog" class="ac-ngdialog">

    <h1 class="modal-title text-left" tabindex="0">Sign in</h1>

    <section class="modal-body">
      <div class="row">
        <div class="form-group">
          <label for="AeroplanNumber" class="first-child-label">
            <span data-ng-hide="submit && loginform.AeroplanNumber.$invalid">AEROPLAN NUMBER</span>
            <span class="error" data-ng-show="submit && loginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.required">This is a required field. Please provide any missing information.</span>
            <span class="error" data-ng-show="submit &&  loginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.pattern">This field accepts only numeric characters (0 - 9).</span>
            <span class="error" data-ng-show="submit &&  loginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.minlength">Please enter a valid frequent flyer number comprised of at least 9 numeric characters (0 to 9).</span>
          </label>
          <input name="AeroplanNumber" type="text" class="form-control input-lg" id="AeroplanNumber" placeholder="Aeroplan Number" value="" maxlength="9" aria-required="true" role="textbox" data-ng-minlength="9" data-ng-model="AeroplanNumber" data-ng-required="true" data-ng-pattern="/^[0-9\s]*$/" data-ng-class="{'submitted':submit==true}">
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
          <label for="password" data-ng-hide="submit && loginform.password.$invalid">PASSWORD</label>
          <label class="error" data-ng-show="submit && loginform.password.$error.required">This is a required field. Please provide any missing information.</label>
          <input name="password" type="password" required class="form-control input-lg" id="password" placeholder="Password" value="" data-ng-model="password" data-ng-class="{'submitted':submit==true}">

          </div>
        </div>

          <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="text-nowrap forget-password" id="lnk_need_help"><a href="https://www4.aeroplan.com/recover/reset-password?lang=en&ref=www.aircanada.com" target="_blank" title="Opens in New Window">Need help with your password?</a></a>

      </div>

        <div class="form-grid" role="presentation">
          <div class="form-row">
            <div class="form-group">
            	<div class="label-select first-child-label">
                  <label for="AeroplanNumber" aria-atomic="true" aria-live="polite" role="status">
                    <span data-ng-if="!(lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$invalid && (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted))" class="form-label-text">AEROPLAN NUMBER</span>
                    <span class="form-error-item" data-ng-if="lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.required && (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted)">This is a required field. Please provide any missing information.</span>
                    <span class="form-error-item" data-ng-if="!aeroplanValid && !lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.required && !lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.minlength && (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted)">Your Aeroplan Number is comprised of 9 digits (valid characters are 0-9).</span>
                    <span class="form-error-item" data-ng-if="lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.minlength && !lateloginform.AeroplanNumber.$error.required && (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted)">Your Aeroplan Number is comprised of 9 digits (valid characters are 0-9).</span>
                  </label>
                  <div class="form-element-wrapper">
                    <input data-ng-if="!isMobileView" data-x-place-clear data-x-place-btn-if-not-empty="true" data-x-select-on-focus type="text" class="form-control" id="AeroplanNumber" placeholder="Aeroplan Number" data-ng-minlength="9" maxlength="20" name="AeroplanNumber" data-ng-model="cui.aeroplanNumber" data-ng-required="lateloginform.$submitted" aria-required="true" data-ng-blur="$parent.visitedAeroplan = cui.fieldBlurred(); $parent.aeroplanValid = cui.validateAeroplanNumber(lateloginform.AeroplanNumber)" data-ng-focus="$parent.visitedAeroplan = cui.fieldFocused(); cui.resetError()" data-ng-class="{'submitted': (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted)}">
					<input data-ng-if="isMobileView" data-x-place-clear data-x-place-btn-if-not-empty="true" data-x-select-on-focus type="tel" class="form-control" id="AeroplanNumber" placeholder="Aeroplan Number" data-ng-minlength="9" maxlength="20" name="AeroplanNumber" data-ng-model="cui.aeroplanNumber" data-ng-required="true" data-ng-blur="$parent.visitedAeroplan = cui.fieldBlurred(); $parent.aeroplanValid = cui.validateAeroplanNumber(lateloginform.AeroplanNumber)" data-ng-focus="$parent.visitedAeroplan = cui.fieldFocused(); cui.resetError()" data-ng-class="{'submitted': (visitedAeroplan || lateloginform.$submitted)}" autocomplete="off">
                  </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="form-row">
            <div class="form-group">
            	<div class="label-select">
                  <label for="password" aria-atomic="true" aria-live="polite" role="status">
                    <span data-ng-hide="lateloginform.password.$invalid && (visitedPassword || lateloginform.$submitted)" class="form-label-text">PASSWORD</span>
                    <span class="form-error-item" data-ng-if="lateloginform.password.$error.required && (visitedPassword || lateloginform.$submitted)">This is a required field. Please provide any missing information.</span>

                    <span class="form-error-item" data-ng-if="lateloginform.password.$error.pattern && !lateloginform.password.$error.minlength && (visitedPassword || lateloginform.$submitted)">Your password must be between 6 and 10 characters long.                   </label>
                  <div class="form-element-wrapper">
                    <input data-x-place-clear data-x-place-btn-if-not-empty="true" data-x-select-on-focus type="password" class="form-control" id="password" name="password" placeholder="Password" data-ng-model="password" data-ng-required="lateloginform.$submitted" aria-required="true" data-ng-minlength="6" maxlength="10" data-ng-pattern="/^[a-zA-Z0-9]*$/" data-ng-blur="visitedPassword = cui.fieldBlurred();" data-ng-focus="visitedPassword = cui.fieldFocused(); cui.resetError();" data-ng-class="{'submitted': (visitedPassword || lateloginform.$submitted)}">
                  </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-grid form-grid-xs" role="presentation">
          <div class="form-row">

	                        	<p>You're about to open the aircanada.com edition for <strong><span data-ng-bind="urlCountryCode"></span></strong>, but it looks like you're located in <strong><span data-ng-bind="geoCorName"></span></strong> <br/><br/>    As no local website edition is available for the country of residence you selected, you have been redirected to the <strong><span data-ng-bind="geoRedirectEdition"></span> Edition</strong>.</p>
	                        	<p>
                              If you choose to complete a booking: 
                            </p>

								    <li>
										Your ticket will be issued and billed in <span data-ng-bind="redirectCurrency"></span>.

										A currency calculator will be available to give you approximate conversions into the currency of your choice.
									</li>

									</li>
									<li>
                    					The contract will be formed in Calgary, Canada.
									</li>
								</ul>
	                        </div>

                              You have been redirected to the <strong> Canadian Edition</strong> of aircanada.com as no local website edition is available for your selected country of residence.
                            </p>
                            <p data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition == 'France'">
                              You have been redirected to the <strong> French Edition</strong> of aircanada.com as no local website edition is available for your selected country of residence.
                            </p>

                            <p tabindex="0">
                              If you choose to complete a booking: 
                            </p>

                                <li>
                                  Your ticket will be issued and billed in <span data-ng-bind="redirectCurrency"></span>.
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                  A currency calculator will be available to give you approximate conversions into the currency of your choice.
                                </li>
                                 <li>
                                   A foreign merchant transaction fee may be charged by your credit card issuing bank at time of billing.
                                </li>
                               <li data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition != 'France'">
                                 The contract will be formed in Calgary, Canada.
                                </li>
                                 <li data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition == 'France'">
                                   The contract will be formed in Paris, France.
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>

                            <p data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition != 'France'">
                              Vous avez été redirigé vers <strong>l'édition canadienne</strong> du site aircanada.com, car il n'y a pas de site Web local dans le pays de résidence que vous avez sélectionné.
                            </p>
                            <p data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition == 'France'">
                              Vous avez été redirigé vers l'édition française du site Web aircanada.com, car il n'y a pas de site Web local dans le pays de résidence que vous avez sélectionné.
                            </p>

                            <p tabindex="0">
                              Si vous choisissez d'effectuer une réservation :
                            </p>
                            <ul class="list-square" tabindex="0">
                                <li>
                                  Votre billet sera délivré et facturé en <span data-ng-bind="redirectCurrency"></span>.
                                </li>
                                <li>
                                  Un convertisseur de devises vous permettra d'effectuer une conversion approximative des montants dans la devise de votre choix.
                                </li>
                                 <li>
                                   La banque émettrice de votre carte de crédit peut exiger des frais de transaction en devises au moment de la facturation.
                                </li>
                               <li data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition != 'France'">
                                 Le contrat sera formé à Calgary (Canada).
                                </li>
                                 <li data-ng-if="geoRedirectEdition == 'France'">
                                   Le contrat sera formé à Paris (France).
                                </li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>

                                </li>
                               <li>

                                </li>
                            </ul>

                        <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="ng-isolate-scope" ng-dialog-show-close="true" ng-dialog-class="ngdialog-theme-default ngdialog-lg" ng-dialog-close-previous="false" ng-dialog="/content/dam/aircanada/portal/html/dialog-box/booking-flow/about_cookies_en.html">Our Cookie Policy</a> | <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="ng-isolate-scope" ng-dialog-show-close="true" ng-dialog-class="ngdialog-theme-default ngdialog-lg" ng-dialog-close-previous="false" ng-dialog="/content/dam/aircanada/portal/html/dialog-box/booking-flow/about_cookies_fr.html">Notre politique sur les témoins (cookies)</a>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-footer small" data-ng-hide="showConfirmEdition">
                <div class="row select-other-edition-content">
                    <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
                        <div class="form-group">
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button" data-ng-click="declineEdition();" data-se-id="declineSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref == 'en'">
                              Decline
                            </button>
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button" data-ng-click="declineEdition();" data-se-id="declineSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref == 'fr'">
                              Refuser
                            </button>
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button" data-ng-click="declineEdition();" data-se-id="declineSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref != 'en' && languagePref != 'fr' && geoRedirectEdition != 'France'">
                              Decline
                            </button>
                            <button type="button" class="btn btn-secondary" role="button" data-ng-click="declineEdition();" data-se-id="declineSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref != 'en' && languagePref != 'fr' && geoRedirectEdition == 'France'">
                              Refuser
                            </button>
                            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" role="button" data-ng-click="acceptEdition();" data-se-id="acceptSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref == 'en'">
                              Accept
                            </button>
                            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" role="button" data-ng-click="acceptEdition();" data-se-id="acceptSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref == 'fr'">
                              Accepter
                            </button>
                            <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary pull-right" role="button" data-ng-click="acceptEdition();" data-se-id="acceptSiteEditionButton" data-ng-if="languagePref != 'en' && languagePref != 'fr' && geoRedirectEdition != 'France'">

                            </button>

                              Accepter
                            </button>
                        </div>
                    </div>

  <div class="img-placeholder img-background" id="pagePromoBanner-wrapper">

<script>
  var imageUrls = "[{\x27img\x27:{\x27src\x27:{\x27lg\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/banners\/home\/lg\-northamerica_v2_en.jpg\x27,\x27md\x27:null,\x27sm\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/banners\/home\/lg\-northamerica_v2_en.jpg\x27,\x27xs\x27:null},\x27alt\x27:\x27northamerica\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/book\/special\-offers\/north\-america.html?icid=fl|achome|northamerica|caen|170830|bnr\x27}}]";
  //console.log(imageUrls);
  (function () {
  imageUrls = eval("(" + imageUrls + ")");
  var coreViewportWidth = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
  var isMSSurface = false;
  if (window.navigator.msManipulationViewsEnabled && window.navigator.msManipulationViewsEnabled == true && window.navigator.maxTouchPoints > 0) {
    if ((/Edge\/12./i.test(navigator.userAgent)) || (/Edge/.test(navigator.userAgent))) {
      isMSSurface = true;
    }
  }

  function getImageHtmlCode() {
    var dataIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * imageUrls.length);
    var bannerInnerHtml = "<div class='";
    if(isMSSurface){
      bannerInnerHtml += "ms-surface-image";
    }
    bannerInnerHtml += "' >";
    if(imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageLink){
      bannerInnerHtml += "<a href='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageLink + "' class='";
      if(isMSSurface){
        bannerInnerHtml += "ms-surface-image";
      }
      bannerInnerHtml += "' >";
    }
    if(coreViewportWidth >= 768){
      bannerInnerHtml += "<img class='hidden-xs' src='";
      bannerInnerHtml += imageUrls[dataIndex].img.src.lg + "' alt='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.alt +"' />'";
    } else {
      bannerInnerHtml += "<img class='visible-xs' src='";
      bannerInnerHtml += imageUrls[dataIndex].img.src.sm + "' alt='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.alt +"' />'";
    }
    if(imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageLink){
      bannerInnerHtml += "</a>";
    }
    bannerInnerHtml += "</div>";
    if(document.getElementById('pagePromoBanner-wrapper')){
      document.getElementById('pagePromoBanner-wrapper').innerHTML = bannerInnerHtml;
    }
  }

  getImageHtmlCode();

  if(window.attachEvent) {
      window.attachEvent('onresize', function() {
          coreViewportWidth = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
          getImageHtmlCode();
      });
  } else if(window.addEventListener) {
      window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
          coreViewportWidth = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
          getImageHtmlCode();
      }, true);
  }
})();
</script>

  </div>
  

  <div data-ng-if="setHomeDisplay()">
    <div data-ng-if="(showEditSearch || showHideSearch || pageLoading) && !hideAvailabilityPage" data-ng-cloak>
      <section id="progressBar" class="ac-progress-bar hidden-xs" data-ng-controller="controller-progress-bar">
	<div class="container">
		<div class="row">
			<div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6">
			</div>
			<div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6">
				<div class="col-md-2 col-lg-2 col-sm-2 col-xs-2 step" data-ng-class="{'completed':$index < currentStep-1, 'current': $index == currentStep-1}" data-ng-repeat="steps in progressBar">
					<span data-ng-if="$index == currentStep-1">
						<span class="steps" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-bind="steps.index"></span>
						<span class="steps-info  hidden-xs" aria-hidden="true"><span data-ng-bind-html="getStepName(steps.name) | unsafe"></span></span>
            <span class="sr-only"><img src="/etc/designs/aircanada/images/spacer.gif" alt="{{steps.index}} {{getStepName(steps.name)}} Current step"/></span>
						<span class="steps-line" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="!$last"></span>
					</span>
					<span data-ng-if="$index > currentStep-1">
						<span class="steps" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-bind="steps.index"></span>
						<span class="steps-info  hidden-xs" aria-hidden="true"><span data-ng-bind-html="getStepName(steps.name) | unsafe"></span></span>
            <span class="sr-only"><img src="/etc/designs/aircanada/images/spacer.gif" alt="{{steps.index}} {{getStepName(steps.name)}} Next step"/></span>
						<span class="steps-line" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="!$last"></span>
					</span>
					<span data-ng-if="$index < currentStep-1">
						<span class="steps" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="steps.index!=-1"></span>
						<span class="steps-info  hidden-xs" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="steps.index!=-1"><span data-ng-bind-html="getStepName(steps.name) | unsafe"></span></span>
            <span class="sr-only"><img src="/etc/designs/aircanada/images/spacer.gif" data-ng-if="steps.index!=-1" alt="{{steps.index}} {{getStepName(steps.name)}} Previous step"/></span>
						<span class="steps-line" aria-hidden="true" data-ng-if="steps.index!=-1"></span>
					</span>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</section>

    </div>

    <div class="magnet-flights active pos-rel" data-ng-controller="ControllerMagnetFlights as cMagnetFlights" data-ng-init="cMagnetFlights.toggleMagnet(true, true)">
      <h2 class="sr-only">Flights</h2>
      <form name="bookingMagnetForm" id="bookingMagnetForm" class="booking-magnet-form form-container-standard" method="post" data-x-place-focus-on-invalid-field autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false">
          <fieldset class="container-fluid">
              <legend class="sr-only">Flights</legend>
              <div class="error-content server-error" data-ng-controller="ControllerMagnetMessages as cMagnetMessages" data-ng-show="cMagnetMessages.getServerMessages().length > 0" id="error-grid" data-ng-cloak>
                <div class="form-grid error-grid info-row clearfix" tabindex="0">
                  <div class="info-icon error-icon" data-ng-class="{'be-error-icon': cMagnetMessages.messages[0].text}">
                    <span class="ac ac-icon ac-warning ac-2x"></span>
                  </div>
                  <div class="info-desc error-desc">
                    <div class="error-label err-label-display" id="bookingMagnetNtpErrorId_{{$index}}" data-ng-repeat="message in cMagnetMessages.messages track by $index">
                      <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.key">
                        <div class="secondary-section-heading" data-ng-bind-html="message.key + '.title' | i18n | unsafe"></div>
                        <div class="message-information" data-ng-bind-html="message.key + '.text' | i18n | unsafe" data-ng-if="cMagnetMessages.isToBeDisplayed(message.key)" id="bookingMagnetNtp_ErrorId_{{$index}}"></div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.text">
                        <div class="secondary-section-heading" data-ng-bind-html="message.title | unsafe" data-ng-if="message.title"></div>
                        <div class="message-information" data-ng-init="message.text = (message.text.indexOf('(' + message.code) > -1 ? message.text.replace(message.text.substr(message.text.indexOf('(' + message.code), message.text.length), '') : message.text)" data-ng-bind-html="message.text | unsafe"></div>
                      </div>
                      <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.code == '1083' || message.code == '1082' || message.code == '1090'">

                          Search Anyway
                        </button>
                      </div>

                        (<span class="sr-only">

                      </span>
                    </div>
                  </div>

              <div class="tab-content-acv" data-ng-if="cMagnetFlights.isTripType('V')" data-ng-cloak>
                  <section data-ng-controller="ControllerMagnetACVacations as cMagnetACV">
  <div class="row clearfix">
    <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
      <form class="form-container-standard" method="post" name="acvForm" novalidate data-x-place-focus-on-invalid-field autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false">

            <div class="col-lg-6 col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12">
              <div class="managed-wrapper error-no-results" data-dev-managed="acv-origin-locations.html" data-dev-managed-title="FROM" data-dev-keyvent-id="acv_depart_location" data-location-list-id="acvSelectListOrigin" role="application">

                <div class="glyph-input-wrapper acv-origin-wrapper" data-x-edit>
                    <label class="sr-only" for="acv_depart_location">FROM</label>
                    <span class="glyph glyph-left ac-icon location ac-1nx bkmg-icon" tabindex="-1"></span>
                    <div class="glyph-holder glyph-left-holder glyph-right-holder form-control sr-only-acv-origin-location" tabindex="0" data-x-edit-passive>

    </li> -->

      <img data-ng-src="/content/dam/aircanada/generic/loader/Loader_v3.svg" data-svg-fallback="/content/dam/aircanada/generic/loader/Loader_v3.gif" class="spinning-loader" alt="Loading..."/>
      Loading...
    </li>
    <li class="option-item" data-ng-repeat="location in cMagnetACV.acvDestinationOptions" id="acv_destination_options_id_{{$index}}" role="option" data-ng-class="{'active': cada.isActive($index)}" data-ng-click="cada.select($index)" data-ng-mouseenter="cada.activate($index)" tabindex="-1" data-ng-bind="location.value"></li>
  </ul>
  <span id="acvSelectListDestinationErrorData" data-ng-if="!(cMagnetACV.locationHasErrors || (cMagnetACV.acvDestinationOptions.length === 0 && !cMagnetACV.locationIsLoading)) && !(cMagnetACV.acvDestinationOptions.length === 0 &&  cMagnetACV.locationIsLoading)"></span>
</div>
<span id="acvSelectListDestinationUpdatedData" class="sr-only" role="status" aria-atomic="true" tabindex="-1"></span>

								</span>
							</div>
							<input type="text" class="glyph-input glyph-left-input form-control hidden" id="ntp_origin_{{$index}}" placeholder="FROM" autocomplete="off" value="" spellcheck="false" aria-activedescendant="ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}_locationListItem_{{trip.origin.activeIndex}}" aria-autocomplete="inline" aria-describedby="ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}ErrorData" aria-expanded="false" aria-labelledby="ntp_origin_{{$index}}_label ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}UpdatedData ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}ScreenReaderData" aria-owns="ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}" role="textbox" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" data-ng-model-options="{'debounce' : cer.debounceAmt}" data-ng-model="trip.origin.typed" data-x-edit-active data-x-place-clear="trip.origin" data-dev-keyvent data-location-list-id="ntpLocationListOriginId{{$index}}" data-ng-blur="cer.isInputValid('origin',$index);">
            </div>
					</div>
					<div class="managed-wrapper col-xs-12 col-sm-6" data-dev-managed="location-destination-ntp.html" data-dev-managed-scroll-x="false" data-dev-managed-title="Destination" data-dev-managed-label="Enter the city name, airport code, province or country." data-dev-keyvent-id="ntp_destination_{{$index}}" data-location-list-id="ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}" data-dev-managed-ntp="true" data-ng-if="trip.origin.airport.code">
            <label for="ntp_destination_{{$index}}" id="ntp_destination_{{$index}}_label">
              <span class="form-label-text">
                Eligible Destinations
              </span>
            </label>
          	<div id="ntp_destination_{{$index}}Label" class="glyph-input-wrapper" data-x-edit>
							<span class="glyph glyph-left ac-icon plane ac-1nx" tabindex="-1"></span>
							<div class="glyph-holder glyph-left-holder form-control ntp-eligible-route-inp" data-x-edit-passive tabindex="0">
								<span class="value" data-ng-if="trip.destination.type">
									<span class="name major" data-ng-bind="trip.destination.city.name"></span>
									<span class="code" data-ng-bind="trip.destination.airport.code"></span>
								</span>
								<span class="default" data-ng-if="!trip.destination.type">
								TO
								</span>
							</div>
							<input type="text" class="glyph-input glyph-left-input form-control hidden" id="ntp_destination_{{$index}}" placeholder="TO" autocomplete="off" value="" spellcheck="false" aria-activedescendant="ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}_locationListItem_{{trip.destination.activeIndex}}" aria-autocomplete="inline" aria-describedby="ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}ErrorData" aria-expanded="false" aria-labelledby="ntp_destination_{{$index}}_label ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}UpdatedData ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}ScreenReaderData" aria-owns="ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}" role="textbox" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" data-ng-model-options="{'debounce' : cer.debounceAmt}" data-ng-model="trip.destination.typed" data-x-edit-active data-x-place-clear="trip.destination" data-dev-keyvent data-location-list-id="ntpLocationListDestinationId{{$index}}" data-ng-disabled="!trip.origin.airport.code" data-ng-blur="cer.isInputValid('destination',$index);">
						</div>
					</div>
          <div class="managed-wrapper col-xs-12 col-sm-6" data-dev-managed-title="Destination" data-dev-managed-label="Enter the city name, airport code, province or country." data-dev-managed-ntp="true" data-ng-if="!trip.origin.airport.code" data-dev-managed-scroll-x="false">
          <label for="ntp_destination_{{$index}}">
            <span class="form-label-text">
                Eligible Destinations
            </span>
					</label>
				<div class="glyph-input-wrapper">
					<span class="glyph glyph-left ac-icon plane ac-1nx" tabindex="-1"></span>
					<div class="glyph-holder glyph-left-holder form-control ntp-eligible-route-inp" tabindex="0">
						<span class="default" data-ng-if="!trip.destination.type">
							TO
						</span>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  </form>
  <div class="modal-footer citylist-footer clearfix">
    <div class="clearfix">
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary pull-right hidden-xs" role="button" data-ng-click="!(cer.trips[0].destination.airport.code && cer.trips[0].origin.airport.code) || cer.applyRoutes();" data-ng-disabled="!(cer.trips[0].destination.airport.code.length >= 3 && cer.trips[0].origin.airport.code.length >= 3)">
        Apply
      </button>
      <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-secondary btn-previous pull-left hidden-xs" role="button" data-ng-click="cer.closeThisDialog();">
      Cancel
      </button>
      <button type="submit" class="btn btn-lg btn-primary pull-right visible-xs" role="button" data-ng-click="!(cer.trips[0].destination.airport.code && cer.trips[0].origin.airport.code) || cer.applyRoutes();" data-ng-disabled="!(cer.trips[0].destination.airport.code.length >= 3 && cer.trips[0].origin.airport.code.length >= 3)">
        Apply
      </button>
      <button type="button" class="btn btn-lg btn-secondary btn-previous pull-left visible-xs" role="button" data-ng-click="cer.closeThisDialog();">
      Cancel
      </button>
      </button>
    </div>
  </div>

                        <input type="text" class="sr-only" id="hotels_child_guests_age" value="" aria-activedescendant="vacationPaxType_{{cMagnetACV.paxes.activeType}}" aria-autocomplete="list" aria-expanded="false" aria-owns="guestTypeList" aria-controls="guestTypeList" role="listbox" readonly="readonly" data-dev-keyvent data-x-edit-active/>
                    </div>
                  </div>

                </div>

                <div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 col-xs-12 text-right search-btn-row remove-right-padding-col">
                  <button id="btnHotelSearch" data-ng-disabled="!cMagnetHotels.isValidDatesSelected" class="btn btn-primary" data-ng-click="cMagnetHotels.search()">Find

                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>
          </div>

              Hotels are provided by our travel partner WWTMS.

          </div>
        </fieldset>
      </form>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<span id="hotel-checkin-date-panel-ScreenReaderData" class="sr-only" tabindex="-1">
  Valid date format: two-digit day, two-digit month, then full four-digit year, each separated by a forward slash or space. Example, enter 21 space 09 space 2016 to represent September 21, 2016, or 01/08/2016 to represent August 1, 2016. Alternately, use arrow keys to move through dates in the calendar grid.

            <div class="tab-content" id="tab_magnet_panel_2" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab_magnet_title_2" aria-hidden="{{!dcTabs.isActive(2)}}" data-ng-cloak data-ng-if="dcTabs.isActive(2)" tabindex="-1">
                <section class="cars-section container-fluid big-to-small" data-ng-controller="ControllerMagnetCars as cMagnetCars">
  <div class="row clearfix">
    <form class="form-container-standard" method="post" novalidate autocomplete="off" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" spellcheck="false">
      <div class="error-content server-error" data-ng-controller="ControllerMagnetMessages as cMagnetMessages" data-ng-show="cMagnetMessages.getServerMessages().length > 0" id="error-grid">
          <div class="form-grid error-grid info-row clearfix" tabindex="0">
            <div class="info-icon error-icon" data-ng-class="{'be-error-icon': cMagnetMessages.messages[0].text}">
              <span class="ac ac-icon ac-warning ac-2x"></span>
            </div>
            <div class="info-desc error-desc">
              <div class="error-label err-label-display" id="bookingMagnetNtpErrorId_{{$index}}" data-ng-repeat="message in cMagnetMessages.messages track by $index">
                <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.key">
                  <div class="secondary-section-heading" data-ng-bind-html="message.key + '.title' | i18n | unsafe" id="bookingMagnetErrorId_{{$index}}"></div>
                  <div class="message-information" data-ng-if="cMagnetMessages.isToBeDisplayed(message.key)" data-ng-bind-html="message.key + '.text' | i18n | unsafe"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.text">
                  <div class="secondary-section-heading" data-ng-bind-html="message.title | unsafe" data-ng-if="message.title"></div>
                  <div class="message-information" data-ng-init="message.text = (message.text.indexOf('(' + message.code) > -1 ? message.text.replace(message.text.substr(message.text.indexOf('(' + message.code), message.text.length), '') : message.text)" data-ng-bind-html="message.text | unsafe"></div>
                </div>
                <div class="error-msgs" data-ng-if="message.code == '1083' || message.code == '1082' || message.code == '1090'">
                  <button type="button" class="search-anyway-magnet btn btn-secondary" id="btnSearchAnyway" role="button" data-ng-click="cMagnetMessages.searchAnyway()">
                    Search Anyway
                  </button>
                </div>
                <span class="error-code error-code-display" data-ng-show="message.code">
                  (<span class="sr-only">
            Error number</span><span data-ng-bind="message.code"></span>)
                </span>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
      </div>

              <input type="text" class="glyph-input glyph-left-input form-control date-right" id="status_by_route_departure" placeholder="DEPARTURE DATE" autocomplete="off" value="" spellcheck="false" aria-describedby="flight-status-route-departure-panel-ErrorData flight-status-route-departure-panel-ScreenReaderData" aria-required="true" role="textbox" autocorrect="off" autocapitalize="off" data-ng-model="cMagnetStatus.byRoute.tripByRoute[0].departure.typed" data-date-picker-panel-id="flight-status-route-departure-panel" data-dev-keyvent data-dev-model-register data-x-edit-active data-ng-if="!cMagnetStatus.isTabletView" JQ-Datepicker data-target="cMagnetStatus.byRoute.tripByRoute" data-index="0" data-jq-start-date="{{cMagnetStatus.datePickerStart}}" data-jq-end-date="{{cMagnetStatus.datePickerEnd}}" data-jq-dyn-months="true" data-ng-change="cMagnetStatus.hasDateChanged('route')" data-ng-blur="cMagnetStatus.clearByRoutepopup(0, $event)"/>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-lg-2 col-md-2 col-sm-2 col-xs-12 search-btn-row">
        <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary" id="btnStatusByRouteSearch" role="button" data-ng-click="cMagnetStatus.search('ROUTE');">
          Find
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  </fieldset>
</form>

  <div data-ng-repeat="seg in cflightStatusRes.flightDetails.segments">
    <div class="flight-number-row">

      <span class="ac-icon ac-roundel-rouge REDROUGE" data-ng-if="seg.logo === 'REDROUGE'"></span>

          <p data-ng-if="seg.statusCode !== 'CANCELLED' && seg.logo !== 'STARALLIANCE'">
            <span data-ng-if="seg.fromTo[0].statusPos == 'departed'" class="status-code">

              </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-4 col-md-4 col-lg-4 current-status">
        <div class="schedule hidden-xs">&nbsp;</div>
        <div class="status-bar" data-ng-class="seg.fromTo[0].statusPos === 'departed' && seg.fromTo[1].statusPos === '' ? seg.statusClass : ''">
          <p>
            <span class="status-dep-arr" data-ng-if="seg.statusCode !== 'CANCELLED' && seg.logo !== 'STARALLIANCE'" data-ng-bind="seg.duration"></span>
            <strong data-ng-if="seg.statusCode != 'CANCELLED'" data-ng-hide="seg.statusDetailed">
                <span class="ac-icon ac-booking-plane"></span>

  <script>
      if (typeof Object.assign != 'function') {
        Object.assign = function (target, varArgs) { // .length of function is 2
          'use strict';
          if (target == null) { // TypeError if undefined or null
            throw new TypeError('Cannot convert undefined or null to object');
          }

          var to = Object(target);

          for (var index = 1; index < arguments.length; index++) {
            var nextSource = arguments[index];

            if (nextSource != null) { // Skip over if undefined or null
              for (var nextKey in nextSource) {
                // Avoid bugs when hasOwnProperty is shadowed
                if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(nextSource, nextKey)) {
                  to[nextKey] = nextSource[nextKey];
                }
              }
            }
          }
          return to;
        };
      }

      function generateCarouselHTML (carousJSON){
        var clk="click"
        var carousHTML = '<div class="carousel-view" id="carousel-view"><div class="carousel-set-wrapper" id="carousel-set-wrapper">';
        for(var i = 0; i < carousJSON.length; i++) {
          var set = carousJSON[i];
          carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-set" id="carousel-set-'+ i +'" aria-hidden="';
          if(i == 0) {
            carousHTML += 'false">';
          } else {
            carousHTML += 'true">';
          }

          for(var j = 0; j < set.length; j++) {
            var unit = set[j];
            carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-unit" id="carousel_' + i +'_unit_' + j +'" data-se-id="carousel_' + i + '_unit_' + j + '"><div class="carousel-image-wrapper"><div>';
            if (!unit.img.imageLink) {
              carousHTML += '<img class="carousel-image" src="' + unit.img.src + '" alt="' + unit.img.alt + '">';
            } else {
              carousHTML += '<a href="' + unit.img.imageLink + '" id="carousel_' + i + '_unitimg_' + j +'" aria-describedby="contentCarouselComponentTitle" tabindex="' + (i === 0 ? 0 : -1) + '">';
              carousHTML += '<img class="carousel-image" src="' + unit.img.src + '" alt="' + unit.img.alt + '">';
              carousHTML += '</a>';
            }
            carousHTML += '</div></div><div class="carousel-content">';
            carousHTML += '<h3 class="carousel-title" id="carouselUnitHeading' + i + '_' + j + '">' + unit.title + '</h3>';
            carousHTML += '<p class="carousel-text">' + unit.text + '</p>';
            carousHTML += '<a class="carousel-link" href="' + unit.link.href + '" id="carousel_' + i + '_unitlink_' + j + '" aria-describedby="contentCarouselComponentTitle carouselUnitHeading' + i + '_' + j + '" tabindex="' + (i === 0 ? 0 : -1) + '">' + unit.link.text + '</a>';

            carousHTML += '</div>';
            carousHTML += '</div>';
          }
          carousHTML += '</div>';
        }
        carousHTML += '</div></div>';
        if(carousJSON.length > 1) {
          carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-pager-mobile" data-ng-style="dcCarousel.wrapperStyle">';
          carousHTML += '<div class="button-action-section visible-xs">';
          carousHTML += '<span onClick="changeSetBy(-1)">';
          carousHTML += '<span class="ac-icon ac-icon-navigation-arrow-left left-arrow carousel_pager_prev_mobile"></span>';
          carousHTML += '</span>';
          carousHTML += '<span onClick="changeSetBy(1)">';
          carousHTML += '<span class="ac-icon ac-navigation-arrow-right right-arrow carousel_pager_next_mobile"></span>';
          carousHTML += '</span>';
          carousHTML += '</div></div>';
          carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-pager hidden-xs">';
          for(var i = 0; i < carousJSON.length; i++) {
            carousHTML += '<button type="button" class="carousel-page" id="carousel_0_pager_' + i + '" onclick="changeSet(' + i + ','+clk+')" role="button" aria-describedby="contentCarouselComponentTitle">';
            carousHTML += '<span class="sr-only">' + "Carousel page" + '</span> ' + (i + 1);
            carousHTML += '</button>';
          }
          carousHTML += '<div class="button-action-section"><div class="carousel-page-button btn btn-primary" onclick="changeSetBy(-1)">';
          carousHTML += "Previous";
          carousHTML += '</div>';
          carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-page-state">' + (i + 1)+ ' of ' + (carousJSON.length + 1) + '</div>';
          carousHTML += '<div class="carousel-page-button btn btn-primary" onclick="changeSetBy(1)">';
          carousHTML += "Next";
          carousHTML += '</div>';
          carousHTML += '</div>';
          carousHTML += '</div>';
        }
        var elementCarous = document.getElementById("carousal_0");
        if(elementCarous){
          elementCarous.innerHTML = carousHTML;
        }
      }

2017\x27,\x27starttime\x27:1502337600000,\x27endtime\x27:1505966400000}]},{\x27img\x27:{\x27src\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/home\/carousel\/carousel\-aeroplan\-reserve\-air\-canada.jpg\x27,\x27alt\x27:\x27Indulge in premium travel\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/altitude\/aeroplan\/amex\-cards.html?icid=fl|achome|amex\-cards|caen|170907|bnr\x27},\x27title\x27:\x27Indulge in premium travel\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Earn 50,000 Bonus Aeroplan Miles and unlimited access to the Maple Leaf Lounge with the American Express<sup>®<\\\/sup> AeroplanPlus<sup>®*<\\\/sup> Reserve Card \x27,\x27link\x27:{\x27href\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/altitude\/aeroplan\/amex\-cards.html?icid=fl|achome|amex\-cards|caen|170907|txt\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Learn more \x27},\x27dates\x27:[{\x27start\x27:\x27Thu Sep 07 04:00:00 GMT 2017\x27,\x27end\x27:\x27Mon Jan 01 05:00:00 GMT 2018\x27,\x27starttime\x27:1504756800000,\x27endtime\x27:1514782800000}]}],\x27fillers\x27:[{\x27img\x27:{\x27src\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/home\/carousel\/ife_787.jpg\x27,\x27alt\x27:\x27Business Class\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/onboard\/entertainment.html\x27},\x27title\x27:\x27Your very own in\-flight theatre. \x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Choose from over 600 hours of complimentary on\-demand in\-flight entertainment on your own screen.\x27,\x27link\x27:{\x27href\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/onboard\/entertainment.html\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Book Now\x27}},{\x27img\x27:{\x27src\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/home\/carousel\/business_class_787.jpg\x27,\x27alt\x27:\x27Business Class\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/onboard\/cabin\-features\/international\-business\-class.html\x27},\x27title\x27:\x27We make Business Travel a pleasure. \x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Designed with your comfort in mind, all our business class seats recline into fully flat beds. \x27,\x27link\x27:{\x27href\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/onboard\/cabin\-features\/international\-business\-class.html\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Learn More\x27}},{\x27img\x27:{\x27src\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/home\/carousel\/skytrax_en_ca.jpg\x27,\x27alt\x27:\x27New destinations\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/book\/routes\-and\-partners\/new\-destinations\/international.html\x27},\x27title\x27:\x27Explore more of the world.\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Discover our new destinations in Asia, Africa, \x26 Europe next summer. \x27,\x27link\x27:{\x27href\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/book\/routes\-and\-partners\/new\-destinations\/international.html\x27,\x27text\x27:\x27Learn More\x27}}]}';
      var stepSize = 3;
      var interval = +('12');
      //  var serverTime = ServiceContext.get('server-time');
      //  var d = new Date();
      var now = new Date();
      var utc_now = new Date(now.getUTCFullYear(), now.getUTCMonth(), now.getUTCDate(), now.getUTCHours(), now.getUTCMinutes(), now.getUTCSeconds(), now.getUTCMilliseconds());
      var serverTime = now.getTime();
      try {
        jsonObj = JSON.parse(jsonObj.replace(/'/g, '\"'));
      } catch (error) {
        console.error(error);
      }

      var current = 0;
      var BY = stepSize;
      var isAttentionInCarousel = false;
      var sets = [];

      var browserVersion = 999;
      if (Function('/*@cc_on return document.documentMode===10@*/')()) {
        browserVersion = 10;
      }
      if (document.documentElement.className.indexOf('lt-ie10') >= 0) {
        browserVersion = 9;
      }
      if (document.documentElement.className.indexOf('lt-ie9') >= 0) {
        browserVersion = 8;
      }

      function isBetterThan(version) {
        return browserVersion > version;
      }

      var BREAKPOINT = {
        // xs
        'sm': 768,
        // sm
        'md': 1024,
        // md
        'lg': 1200
          // lg
      };
      function isBreakpointLessThan(point) {
        return getWidth() < BREAKPOINT[point];
      }

      function getWidth() {
        return window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth || document.body.clientWidth;
      }
      // override step for `xs`
      var BY = isBreakpointLessThan('sm') ? 1 : BY;
      var units = jsonObj.carousels.filter(function (cUnit) {
        return cUnit.dates.some(function (cDate) {
          return cDate['starttime'] <= serverTime && serverTime <= cDate['endtime'];
        })
      });

      /**
        PTR 10694491 [Medium]: WWW-AC-NWP-UAT: WWW-AC-NWP-UAT:Viewpoint issues - responsive design
        on window resize construct the carousel sets again and get everything to initial state
      **/
      window.addEventListener('resize', function () {
        resetCarouselOnResize();
      });

      window.addEventListener('orientationchange', function () {
        resetCarouselOnResize();
      });

      resetCarouselOnResize = function () {
        setTimeout(function () {
        BY = stepSize;
        BY = isBreakpointLessThan('sm') ? 1 : BY;
        resetCarouselItems();
        }, 0);
      }

      /**
        function resetCarouselItems
        @param "";
        @returns "";
        function to reset the carousel step to start and construct the carousel sets depending upon the viewport
      **/

      resetCarouselItems = function () {
        current = 0;
        changeSetBy(0);
        constructCarouselSets();
        updateStyle();
      }

      // fill with fillers
      for (var i = 0;(units.length === 0 || units.length % this.BY !== 0) && i < jsonObj.fillers.length; i++) {
        units.push(Object.assign({},(jsonObj.fillers[i])));
      }

      // group into sets of step size
      constructCarouselSets = function () {
       sets = [];
        units.forEach(function (cUnit, index) {
          if (!sets[Math.floor(index / BY)]) {
            sets[Math.floor(index / BY)] = [];
          }
          sets[Math.floor(index / BY)].push(cUnit);
        });
      }

      constructCarouselSets();

      var updateStyle = function () {
        if (isBetterThan(10)) {
          var wrapperStyle = {
            width: sets.length * 100 + '%',
            transform: 'translateX(-' + 100 * current / sets.length + '%)'
          };
          var setStyle = {
            width: 100 / sets.length + '%'
          };
          if(document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper')){
            document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper').style.width = wrapperStyle.width;
            document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper').style.msTransform = wrapperStyle.transform;
            document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper').style.mozTransform = wrapperStyle.transform;
            document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper').style.webkitTransform = wrapperStyle.transform;
            document.getElementById('carousel-set-wrapper').style.transform = wrapperStyle.transform;
          }
          for(var i = 0; i < sets.length; i++) {
            if(document.getElementById('carousel-set-' + i)){
              document.getElementById('carousel-set-' + i).style.width = setStyle.width;
            }
          }
        } else {
          var wrapperStyle = {
            width: sets.length * 100 + '%'
          };
          var setStyle = {
            width: 100 / sets.length + '%'
          };
        }
      };

      function hideElements(prevIndex){
        for(var i = 0; i < sets[prevIndex].length; i++) {
          if(document.getElementById("carousel_" + prevIndex + "_unitimg_" + i)){
            document.getElementById("carousel_" + prevIndex + "_unitimg_" + i).setAttribute('tabindex', -1);
          }
          if(document.getElementById("carousel_" + prevIndex + "_unitlink_" + i)){
            document.getElementById("carousel_" + prevIndex + "_unitlink_" + i).setAttribute('tabindex', -1);
          }
        }
        var el = document.getElementById("carousel_0_pager_" + prevIndex);
        if(el) {
          if (el.classList)
            el.classList.remove("active");
          else
            el.className = el.className.replace(new RegExp('(^|\\b)' + "active".split(' ').join('|') + '(\\b|$)', 'gi'), ' ');
        }
        el = document.getElementById("carousel-set-" + prevIndex);
        if(el) {
          el.setAttribute('tabindex', -1);
        }
      }

      function showElements(nextIndex, clk){
        for(var i = 0; i < sets[nextIndex].length; i++) {
          if(document.getElementById("carousel_" + nextIndex + "_unitimg_" + i)){
            document.getElementById("carousel_" + nextIndex + "_unitimg_" + i).setAttribute('tabindex', 0);
          }
          if(document.getElementById("carousel_" + nextIndex + "_unitlink_" + i)){
            document.getElementById("carousel_" + nextIndex + "_unitlink_" + i).setAttribute('tabindex', 0);
          }
        }
        var el = document.getElementById("carousel_0_pager_" + nextIndex);
        if(el) {
          if (el.classList)
            el.classList.add("active");
          else
            el.className += ' active';
        }
        el = document.getElementById("carousel-set-" + nextIndex);
        if(el) {
          el.setAttribute('tabindex', 0);
        }
        if(typeof clk !== "undefined"){
          setTimeout(function () {
            document.getElementById("carousel_" + nextIndex + "_unitimg_0").focus();
          }, 100);
        }
      }

      var changeSet = function (targetIndex, clk) {
        hideElements(current);
        current = targetIndex;
        showElements(current,clk);
        updateStyle();
      };

      var changeSetBy = function (byCount) {
        var targetIndex = (current + sets.length + byCount) % sets.length;
        changeSet(targetIndex);
      };

      //initialize
      function initCarousel() {
        generateCarouselHTML(sets);
        var el = document.getElementById("carousel_0_pager_0");
        if(el) {
          if (el.classList)
            el.classList.add("active");
          else
            el.className += ' active';
        }
        updateStyle();
      }
      initCarousel();
      setInterval(function () {
        if (!isAttentionInCarousel) {
          changeSetBy(+1);
        }
      }, interval * 1000);
      // events swipe and drag
      var xBeginPointer,
        isPointerDown = false,
        THRESHOLD_X = 20;

      var currElem = document.getElementById("carousal_0");
      if(currElem) {
        currElem.addEventListener("pointerdown" , function (event) {
          isPointerDown = true;
          xBeginPointer = event.clientX;
        });

        currElem.addEventListener("mouseenter" , function () {
          isAttentionInCarousel = true;
        })

        currElem.addEventListener("focusin" , function () {
          isAttentionInCarousel = true;
        })

        currElem.addEventListener("mouseleave" , function () {
          isAttentionInCarousel = false;
        })

        currElem.addEventListener("focusout" , function () {
          isAttentionInCarousel = false;
        })
      }
    </script>



  </div>
</section>
</div>

  (function () {
    var imageUrls = "[{\x27img\x27:{\x27imagePath\x27:\x27\/content\/dam\/aircanada\/portal\/images\/home\/banner\/new\-ac\-livery.jpg\x27,\x27imageAlt\x27:\x27New Air Canada\x26#39;s Livery\x27,\x27imageLink\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/aircanada.html?icid=ac|achome|livery|caen|170209|bnr\x27},\x27link\x27:{\x27linkHref\x27:\x27\/ca\/en\/aco\/home\/fly\/aircanada.html?icid=ac|achome|livery|caen|170209|txt\x27,\x27linkText\x27:\x27Introducing our new livery\x27}}]";

    var coreViewportWidth = Math.max(document.documentElement.clientWidth, window.innerWidth || 0);
    var isMSSurface = false;
		
    if (window.navigator.msManipulationViewsEnabled && window.navigator.msManipulationViewsEnabled == true && window.navigator.maxTouchPoints > 0) {
      if ((/Edge\/12./i.test(navigator.userAgent)) || (/Edge/.test(navigator.userAgent))) {

    function getImageHtmlCode() {
      var dataIndex = Math.floor(Math.random() * imageUrls.length);
      var bannerInnerHtml = "";
      bannerInnerHtml += "<div class='tile-image-wrapper'>";
      if(imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageLink){
        bannerInnerHtml += "<a class=\"tile-link\" href='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageLink + "' aria-describedby='didYouKnowTitle'>";
        bannerInnerHtml += "<img class=\"tile-image\" src='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imagePath + "' alt='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageAlt + "'/></a>";
      } else {
        bannerInnerHtml += "<img class=\"tile-image\" src='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imagePath + "' alt='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].img.imageAlt + "'/>";
      }
      bannerInnerHtml += "</div>";
      bannerInnerHtml += "<div class='tile-about'>";
      if(imageUrls[dataIndex].link.linkHref){
        bannerInnerHtml += "<a class='tile-link' href='" + imageUrls[dataIndex].link.linkHref + "' aria-describedby='didYouKnowTitle' data-se-id='did_you_know_link'>" + imageUrls[dataIndex].link.linkText + "</a>";
      } else {
        bannerInnerHtml += "<span class='tile-link'>" + imageUrls[dataIndex].link.linkText + "</span>";
      }
      bannerInnerHtml += "</div>";
      if(document.getElementById('promoTile-wrapper')){
        document.getElementById('promoTile-wrapper').innerHTML = bannerInnerHtml;
      }
    }

    getImageHtmlCode();
})();
</script>
